alert.note: Alert for Craig; Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 1:57AM CDT until May 15 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Craig County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Ottawa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 157 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of White Oak, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Miami... Welch... Bluejacket... Narcissa... Pyramid Corners... Centralia... Centrailia... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 303 and 308. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
